The Review of Scientific Instruments with Physics News and Views .A Hooker, R.H. A study of the periodicals for the subjects of physics and radio has been undertaken with the hope of indicating those which are most used in each field. The method selected is similar to that used by P.L.K. Gross and E.M. Gross. .X 33	1	1260 36	1	1260 37	1	1260 41	1	1260 48	1	1260 89	1	1260 97	1	1260 102	1	1260 111	1	1260 112	1	1260 163	1	1260 167	1	1260 183	1	1260 184	1	1260 193	1	1260 198	1	1260 199	1	1260 203	1	1260 210	1	1260 225	1	1260 255	1	1260 269	1	1260 373	1	1260 543	1	1260 545	1	1260 552	1	1260 587	1	1260 605	1	1260 613	1	1260 614	3	1260 635	1	1260 638	3	1260 735	2	1260 747	1	1260 748	1	1260 750	1	1260 753	2	1260 756	1	1260 757	1	1260 766	1	1260 767	1	1260 775	1	1260 782	1	1260 784	1	1260 787	1	1260 788	1	1260 789	1	1260 792	1	1260 793	1	1260 800	1	1260 808	1	1260 821	1	1260 831	1	1260 905	1	1260 952	3	1260 953	3	1260 977	1	1260 983	1	1260 1016	1	1260 1023	1	1260 1030	1	1260 1055	1	1260 1083	1	1260 1087	1	1260 1090	1	1260 1135	1	1260 1210	2	1260 1254	1	1260 1256	1	1260 1260	5	1260 1275	5	1260 1276	3	1260 1278	2	1260 1280	1	1260 1285	1	1260 1286	1	1260 1287	1	1260 1302	4	1260 1335	1	1260 1369	1	1260 1373	1	1260 1390	1	1260 1397	1	1260 1417	1	1260 1418	1	1260 1428	1	1260 1432	1	1260 1432	1	1260
